sourcesContent:
import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function MatchCard(props) { const fixData = props.matchData const data = new Date(fixData?.nextMatch?.status?.utcTime); const mese = ("0" + (data.getMonth() + 1)).slice(-2); const giorno = ("0" + data.getDate()).slice(-2); const dataFormattata = `${mese}/${giorno}`; return (
{fixData?.lastMatch?.home?.name}
{fixData?.lastMatch?.notStarted === false ? ( <>
{fixData?.lastMatch?.status?.scoreStr}
{fixData?.lastMatch?.status?.reason?.short} ) : ( {dataFormattata} )}
{fixData?.lastMatch?.away?.name}
) } export default MatchCard
